priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire BPI Short Form Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C100163

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire BPI Short Form Test Name Terminology

definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form test name.
name: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire BPI Short Form Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - On the diagram, put an X on the area that hurts the most.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Area that Hurts Most

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - On the diagram, shade in the areas where you feel pain.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Areas of Pain

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its least in the last 24 hours.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain at its Least in Last 24 Hours
terms.submissionValue: BPI2-Pain at its Least in Last 24 Hours
synonyms: BPI2-Pain at its Least in Last 24 Hours

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its worst in the last 24 hours.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain at its Worst in Last 24 Hours
terms.submissionValue: BPI2-Pain at its Worst in Last 24 Hours
synonyms: BPI2-Pain at its Worst in Last 24 Hours

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your enjoyment of life.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Enjoyment of Life

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your general activity.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with General Activity

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your walking ability.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Walking Ability

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your mood.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Mood

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your normal work.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Normal Work

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your relations with other people.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Relations

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past 24 hours, pain has interfered with your sleep.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Interfered with Sleep

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain on the average.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain on the Average

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Have you had pain other than these everyday kinds of pain today?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Other Than Everyday Kinds

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that tells how much pain you have right now.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Pain Right Now

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - In the last 24 hours, how much relief have pain treatments or medications provided? Please circle the one percentage that most shows how much relief you have received.
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Relief from Pain Treatments Provided

terms.definition: Brief Pain Inventory Short Form - What treatments or medications are you receiving for your pain?
terms.preferredTerm: BPI Short Form - Treatments or Medications Receiving for Pain
